title: Implement RollbackManager class
description: Create rollback.py module with RollbackManager class that can restore system state from checkpoints
details:
Implement core rollback functionality:
- Create RollbackManager class in claude_orchestrator/rollback.py
- Integrate with CheckpointManager to restore state
- Handle rollback triggers (errors, manual requests)
- Implement rollback validation
- Add logging and monitoring
